# jumpcloud Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String) The x-api-key header used to connect to JumpCloud.

### Optional

- `org_id` (String) The x-org-id header used to connect to JumpCloud.
